QuestData.Title: The Seven Burdens of Shaohao
QuestData.Description: Dear $p,$b$bIt would seem you have discovered the full tale of Shaohao, the last emperor of Pandaria.$b$bIf you visit us at the Seat of Knowledge in Vale of Eternal Blossoms we can add this contribution to your personal collection.$b$bThank you for your diligence!$b$bSincerely,$b$bLorewalker Cho
QuestData.LogDescription: Bring The Seven Burdens of Shaohao to Lorewalker Cho at the Seat of Knowledge.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Speak with Lorewalker Cho at the Seat of Knowledge in the Vale of Eternal Blossoms.
